#2 Purchase Money Lender in California 2013#2 Builder Lender in California 2013At imortgage we understand that in today’s market, home financing requires a company with a proven track record, financial strength and integrity. Our unwavering commitment to excellence in these three key areas has earned us a reputation as one of the most well respected companies in the industry.Founded in 1999, imortgage grew from the concept of creating a premier builder-based mortgage banking company to a consumer-friendly system that provides a vast array of mortgage products, which gives our customers and business partners a clear advantage. Headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona, imortgage has offices in multiple states and is looking to continue its solid track record of growth.As the market changed in 2007, imortgage recognized an opportunity to expand into a retail business channel. With the ability to capitalize on its reputation, imortgage sought out individuals that represented the core culture of integrity to establish a retail presence. Today we are one of the fastest growing privately held retail companies in the Western United States. As we look to the future, our ability to provide big company resources combined with the agility to move quickly as an independent mortgage banker will ensure our continued success.The financial strength of imortgage enables us to continue our access to credit facilities and investor groups that are essential to our industry. We are a fully approved direct lender for FNMA, FHA, VA, HUD and USDA. In addition, we actively participate in and become experts in state and local government loan programs.www.imortgage.com/licensingwww.imortgage.com/privacy

Helping people find the best home financing options that fit their situation Responsible for originating long lasting Realtor-Lender relationshipsOutstanding Customer ServiceAt Bay Equity, we offer a full range of products and provide each and every client with outstanding customer service. Because of this our clients are presented with a specialist that will detail the perfect loan scenario to fit your needs. Each client experiences the best in customer service and integrity. We, at all times, operate with the utmost professionalism, remembering that our Bank is client-centered and client driven. We will provide insight on the current market and can give you a full loan approval in a matter of minutes. Bay Equity is also committed to being the leader in price and service, which is why we partner with the largest names in the financial world. At Bay Equity, our clients and the needs of our clients always come first. Examine mortgage options from Bay Equity and find the one that's right for you. Whether you're buying your first house, or you're a seasoned homeowner we offer mortgage loans to fit your needs. Prequalify today and enjoy: •Custom rates and pricing •Expert advice to complete your application •A quick and simple processNo matter what kind of mortgage you're interested in, you'll enjoy expert home-buying advice from a bank you can trust, Bay Equity. Let us help you find the right mortgage today. Bay Equity is a growing mortgage bank with branch locations across the Western US. Please ask me if you are interested in coming into the branch. We are committed to our community and enjoy meeting our clients in person. We look forward to working with you soon.

Director of FUN!!!
December 7, 2011, Julie worked with Chris but at different companies

Chris is a very detailed oriented and customer focused Mortgage Broker that makes the entire loan process a breeze for my clients. He closed on time and does not hide any nasty conditions that could jeopardize a home closing.  In addition, Chris answers his phone in the evening, weekends, and holidays!  He definitely sets the standards and is always focused on the client and not getting the deal. If it doesn't make sense he will openly tell them.  I would recommend Chris to anyone looking for a reputable and creative Mortgage officer that sees the deal as so much more than a number.

summary: Honesty is the heart of my business. If you are looking for a solution minded banker that has the experience to know the constantly changing guidelines, you have come to the right place. I take pride in my ability to see the full picture and overcome obstacles that others would not see all the way through. I entered the industry as thousands were leaving in December of 2008. For the past 9 years I have been living, learning and breathing everything that has to do with residential financing done THE RIGHT WAY. I have been blessed to have the opportunity to work alongside some of the Real Estate Industry's top professionals. I specialize in finding the right mortgage option to fit every client's unique financial situation. With so much involved in getting a mortgage I make sure to be easily accessible to answer any questions and make sure they know when working with me that they will always receive the up most dedication and respect.Licensing & Affiliations: NMLS ID# 275073, Contra Costa Association of Realtors, YPN, Orange County Association of Realtors, Irvine Chamber of CommerceSpecialties: Business Development, luxury Jumbo Financing, Equity Repositioning, Real Estate Finance, FHA and VA Programs, First Time Home Buyers Residential Financing, Real Estate Portfolio Management,
